peopleAlsoAsk.question: Is Portugal ending its Golden Visa program?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: The Portugal Golden Visa program is not ending or being suspended. However, important modifications were made to it. In 2023, the new legislation came into force, and investing in real estate to qualify for the program is no longer possible.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Is the Portugal Golden Visa Ending? Not Exactly | 2025 Update

peopleAlsoAsk.question: What is the minimum investment for Portugal Golden Visa 2025?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: The minimum investment for Portugal Golden Visa for US citizens in 2025 is EUR 250,000 for cultural heritage donations, EUR 350,000 for research activities, or EUR 500,000 for investment funds.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Portugal Golden Visa for US Citizens | Application 2025 - Harvey Law Group

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Will I need a visa to go to Portugal in 2025?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: What are the Portugal entry requirements for US citizens in 2025? If you plan to visit Portugal for business or travel, you don't need a Portugal tourist visa, provided your trip doesn't exceed 90 days. As a US Citizen, you're only required to have a US passport valid for at least three months beyond your stay.
